All Implemented Interfaces:
com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixExecutable<com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<RowKeyType,java.lang.String>>
public class HystrixCassandraGetRowsByKeys<RowKeyType>
extends AbstractCassandraHystrixCommand<com.netflix.astyanax.model.Rows<RowKeyType,java.lang.String>>

Fetches values in multiple rows from Cassandra using row keys.

Retrieves all columns by default or can be filtered with the withColumns method.
